ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Walrus Skin Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a tambourine already - main point is I have a friend who got the drum and will give it me at a 50 pct discount of the going rate.  I want to see that
ygData.messageBody:
I have a tambourine already - main point is I have a friend who got the drum
and will give it me at a 50 pct discount of the "going" rate. I want to see
that she s fairly compensated - as long as it is "within my budget" if you
know what I mean!

BTW - you didn't sign it - so I'm not sure what server you on. I no longer
have access to eqprices - (I'm too cheap to pay them for it!) is that 3K for
Xegony?

Thanks
Slyde
Xegony
-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Friday, July 13, 2001 5:19 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Walrus Skin Drum



I did some testing on this. Chant of battle at 51 is 30 str and dex with a
hand drum.
With Nostolo tamborine it is 37 str and dex
With Walrus skin drum it is 39 str and dex
Guess that makes it about even with sharksin drum and on eq prices that is
around 3k. But for the money, I think it would be cheaper to just buy your
tamborine quest coins and get that. Better graphic too.
